_id.description: Unique identifier for the stock item

_cursor.description: Cursor for pagination in the API response

Description.description: Main description of the stock item

Description2.description: Secondary description of the stock item

Upc.description: UPC (Universal Product Code) of the stock item

Received.description: Quantity of the stock item that has been received

Available.description: unallocated; see IsOnHold for whether it's allocatable

IsOnHold.description: true if receive item explicitly held

Quarantined.description: true if implicitly held because of located in quarantine

OnHand.description: Quantity of the stock item currently on hand

SecondaryReceived.description: Quantity of the stock item received in secondary units

SecondaryAvailable.description: unallocated; see IsOnHold for whether it's allocatable

LotNumber.description: Lot number associated with the stock item

SerialNumber.description: Serial number associated with the stock item

ExpirationDate.description: Date and time when the stock item expires

SupplierIdentifier.description: Identifier for the supplier of the stock item

LocationIdentifier.description: Identifier for the location of the stock item

PalletIdentifier.description: Identifier for the pallet holding the stock item

InventoryUnitOfMeasureIdentifier.description: Identifier for the unit of measure for inventory

SecondaryUnitOfMeasureIdentifier.description: Identifier for the secondary unit of measure

InventoryUnitsPerSecondaryUnit.description: Number of inventory units per secondary unit

ReceiverId.description: Identifier for the receiver of the stock item

ReceivedDate.description: Date and time when the stock item was received

ReferenceNum.description: Reference number associated with the stock item

PoNum.description: Purchase order number associated with the stock item

TrailerNumber.description: Trailer number associated with the stock item

SavedElements.description: Saved additional elements related to the stock item

items.description: Additional item related to the stock item

WeightImperial.description: Weight of the stock item in imperial units

WeightMetric.description: Weight of the stock item in metric units
